name: Super Mario Odyssey 2D (Ver. 1.0.0 a)
description:
There are only the first 3 kingdoms in this build so I may add more in the future if this gets positive feedback :)

CONTROLS: 

Move - A & D

Jump - W

Throw Cappy - Left-click

NOTE: MacOS and Linux builds may be unstable as I'm not able to test them.

Original game by Nintendo. I don't want to take credit for the official game as this is entirely a fan recreation.
